languages.text: "Вынуждена отказать в вашей... просьбе. Хотите обречь команду на смерть — как пожелаете, вы капитан сего судна. Только прежде отправьте меня на Райкад Минорис".

traits.locale_text: "Вынуждена отказать в вашей... просьбе. Хотите обречь команду на смерть — как пожелаете, вы капитан сего судна. Только прежде отправьте меня на Райкад Минорис".

languages.text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."
languages.original_text: "Вынуждена отказать в вашей... просьбе. Хотите обречь команду на смерть — как пожелаете, вы капитан сего судна. Только прежде отправьте меня на Райкад Минорис".

traits.locale_text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."
"I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."
"I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."
"I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."

languages.text: “我不得不拒绝你的……请求。就算你想让带着这艘船上的每个人走上绝路，这也是你身为舰长的特权。但在此之前，请先把我送到小莱卡德星吧。”
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."

traits.locale_text: “我不得不拒绝你的……请求。就算你想让带着这艘船上的每个人走上绝路，这也是你身为舰长的特权。但在此之前，请先把我送到小莱卡德星吧。”

languages.text: 「あたくしは陛下の要求を…拒否せざるを得ません。この船のすべての魂を破滅させたいのであれば、それはこの船のキャプテンとしての特権です。ですが、そうする前にあたくしをライカド・ミノリスに送ってくださいませ」
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."

traits.locale_text: 「私はあなたの要求を拒否せざるを得ません。この船のすべての魂を破滅させたいのであれば、それはこの船の船長としてのあなたの特権です。ですが、そうする前に私をライカド・ミノリスに送ってください」
「あたくしは陛下の要求を…拒否せざるを得ません。この船のすべての魂を破滅させたいのであれば、それはこの船のキャプテンとしての特権です。ですが、そうする前にあたくしをライカド・ミノリスに送ってくださいませ」

languages.text: "Ich muss Eure ... Bitte ablehnen. Wenn Ihr jede Seele auf diesem Schiff zum Untergang verdammen wollt, ist das Euer Recht als Captain. Aber vorher werdet Ihr mich nach Rykad Minoris schicken."
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Eure ... Bitte ablehnen. Wenn Ihr jede Seele auf diesem Schiff zum Untergang verdammen wollt, ist das Euer Recht als Captain. Aber vorher werdet Ihr mich nach Rykad Minoris schicken."

languages.text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser votre... requête. En tant que capitaine de ce vaisseau, vous êtes libre de condamner toutes les âmes à bord. Mais je vous prierai de me déposer sur Rykad Minoris avant cela. »
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."

traits.locale_text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser votre... requête. En tant que capitaine de ce vaisseau, vous êtes libre de condamner toutes les âmes à bord. Mais je vous prierai de me déposer sur Rykad Minoris avant cela. »

languages.text: «Me veo obligada a rechazar su... petición. Si, como capit{mf|án|ana} de la nave, quiere condenar a todas las almas que hay a bordo, es libre de hacerlo, pero antes me llevará a Rykad Minoris».
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."

traits.locale_text: «Me veo obligada a rechazar su... petición. Si, como capit{mf|án|ana} de la nave, quiere condenar a todas las almas que hay a bordo, es libre de hacerlo, pero antes me llevará a Rykad Minoris».

languages.text: "Bu... Emrini reddetmek durumundayım. Bu gemideki herkesi ölüme sürüklemek arzusundaysan geminin kaptanı olarak elbette böyle bir imtiyaza sahipsin lakin bunu yapmadan evvel beni Rykad Minoris'e göndermeni isteyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to refuse your... request. If you wish to doom every soul on this ship, that is your prerogative as the captain of this vessel. But you will send me to Rykad Minoris before you do so."

traits.locale_text: "Bu... Emrini reddetmek durumundayım. Bu gemideki herkesi ölüme sürüklemek arzusundaysan geminin kaptanı olarak elbette böyle bir imtiyaza sahipsin lakin bunu yapmadan evvel beni Rykad Minoris'e göndermeni isteyeceğim."
